async.title: Non-strict mode (async)
async.description: By activating this option, rate-limiting is applied in an asynchronous way meaning that the distributed counter value is not strict.

addHeaders.title: Add response headers
addHeaders.description: Add X-Rate-Limit-Limit, X-Rate-Limit-Remaining and X-Rate-Limit-Reset headers in HTTP response

limit.title: Max requests
limit.description: Limit on the number of requests that can be sent.
